name: Swoosh (itch) (Gustav Elmqvist)
description:
Swoosh is a physics based fast paced game where you control a sphere jumping between islands and collecting stars. Swoosh could be described as a 3D version of the mobile game Tiny Wings.

I have some ideas for future development and I might continue to work on the game if I can find the time :)

This game was made for the course TDDD23 - Design and Programming of Computer Games at Linköping University.
